content.query:
CREATE TABLE Orders  
(      OrderID int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL     ,
OrderDate datetime NOT NULL     ,
OrderDescription char(15) DEFAULT 'NewOrder' )  
WITH  (   CLUSTERED INDEX (OrderID)  ,   DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN  );

CREATE TABLE Orders2  
(      OrderID int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL     ,
OrderDate datetime NOT NULL     ,
OrderDescription char(15) DEFAULT 'NewOrder' )  
WITH  (   CLUSTERED INDEX (OrderID)  ,   DISTRIBUTION = HASH(OrderDate)   );

CREATE TABLE OrdersPartition
(      OrderID int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
,OrderDate datetime NOT NULL
,OrderDescription char(15) DEFAULT 'NewOrder'  )
WITH  
(     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
PARTITION       (        OrderDate RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES         
(           '2017-02-05T00:00:00.000'
, '2017-02-12T00:00:00.000'
, '2017-02-19T00:00:00.000'
, '2017-02-26T00:00:00.000'
, '2017-03-05T00:00:00.000'
, '2017-03-12T00:00:00.000'
, '2017-03-19T00:00:00.000'   )
)
);


CREATE TABLE dbo.Orders_Staging   (OrderID int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL   ,
OrderDate datetime NOT NULL   ,OrderDescription char(15) DEFAULT 'NewOrder'   );
ALTER TABLE dbo.OrdersPartition SWITCH PARTITION 3 to dbo.Orders_Staging;
